treatment-md.title: Macrobiotus reinhardti Michalczyk & Kaczmarek, 2003, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: A description of the new tardigrade Macrobiotus reinhardti (Eutardigrada: Macrobiotidae, harmsworthi group) with some remarks on the oral cavity armature within the genus Macrobiotus Schultze
